description: OnePlus unveild the release of its newest invention, the “AI Eraser,” in a bold attempt to completely reimagine smartphone picture editing capabilities. OnePlus is moving toward creating content produced by AI with this novel feature, which claims to allow users to quickly remove unwanted elements from their photos using artificial intelligence.
